==Rieti== ===Rieti=== *Cattedrale di Santa Maria Assunta (1841) ==Rome== There are 4 major basilicas of the Catholic Church in the Italian peninsula; 3 in the city of Rome proper and 1 in Vatican City. The latter is completely surrounded by the city of Rome and is part of the Diocese of Rome. *San Pietro in Vaticano (ancient) *San Giovanni in Laterano (ancient) *San Paolo fuori le Mura (ancient) *Santa Maria Maggiore (ancient) There are 62 minor basilicas of the Catholic Church in Rome, excluding the above major basilicas. ===Rome=== *Nostra Signora di Guadalupe e San Filippo in Via Aurelia (1991) *Sacro Cuore di Cristo Re (1965) *Sacro Cuore di Gesù a Castro Pretorio (1921) *Sacro Cuore di Maria (Cuore Immacolato di Maria) (1959) *Sant'Agnese fuori le Mura (ancient) *Sant'Agostino
